column4: BRIEF-HCI Group Insurance Subsidiary Enters Into Policy Replacement Agreement With Anchor Property & Casualty Insurance Company
column6: * HCI GROUP INSURANCE SUBSIDIARY ENTERS INTO POLICY REPLACEMENT AGREEMENT WITH ANCHOR PROPERTY & CASUALTY INSURANCE COMPANY
column7: * HCI GROUP INC - UNDER AGREEMENT WITH ANCHOR PROPERTY & CASUALTY INSURANCE COMPANY, ANCHOR WILL CANCEL ALL ITS POLICIES AS OF APRIL 1, 2020
column8: * HCI GROUP INC - UNDER AGREEMENT, HOMEOWNERS CHOICE WILL OFFER TO ANCHOR’S POLICYHOLDERS SHORT-TERM REPLACEMENT POLICIES, FOR POLICIES CANCELLED
column9: * HCI GROUP INC - ANCHOR’S POLICYHOLDERS WILL BE UNDER NO OBLIGATION TO ACCEPT REPLACEMENT POLICIES
column10: * HCI GROUP INC - ANCHOR WILL RETAIN LIABILITY FOR POLICYHOLDER CLAIMS ARISING FROM EVENTS OCCURRING ON OR BEFORE MARCH 31, 2020
column11: * HCI GROUP INC - UPON EXPIRATION OF REPLACEMENT POLICIES, HOMEOWNERS CHOICE WILL OFFER RENEWALS TO POLICYHOLDERS AT ITS OWN RATES AND TERMS
column12: * HCI GROUP INC - AGREEMENT CONTAINS NO PURCHASE PRICE FOR TRANSITION OF BUSINESS TO HOMEOWNERS CHOICE
column13: * HCI GROUP - AGREEMENT WITH ANCHOR INCLUDES A PAYMENT BASED ON PREMIUM IN FORCE ASSOCIATED WITH REPLACEMENT POLICES REMAINING IN FORCE AT JUNE 1 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
